Please wait while your transaction is authorised with the bank. postcodepop.htm Proceed proceed_btn.gif proceed_over.gif Sage Pay - Keeping Money Moving Sage Pay SECURE SERVER Security Code securitycodepop.htm Your Shopping Basket Abort 3D-Secure checks. skip3D_btn.gif skip3D_over.gif submitted.gif subsmall.gif Enter Card Details Enter Security Code Select Payment Method Transaction Details 3D Callback 3D-Secure Authentication 3D Redirect To increase the security of Internet transactions Visa and Mastercard have recently introduced 3D-Secure (like an online version of Chip and PIN). Depending on the card you have chosen to use and the retailer from whom you are purchasing, when you click Proceed you may be asked by your card issuer for further authentication. To increase the security of Internet transactions Visa and Mastercard have introduced 3D-Secure (like an online version of Chip and PIN). You have chosen to use a card that is part of the 3D-Secure scheme, so you will need to authenticate yourself with your bank in the section below. If your bank's validation screens do not appear in the area above, click here to skip the 3D-Authentication. You should ONLY do this if the authentication screens do not appear. Your order from has been successful. The unique reference for this transaction is: ** VERY IMPORTANT - Cancellation Notification ** Dear Dear Sir/Madam, Thank you for your order. Your payment has been processed successfully. Thank you for your order. Your card was authorised successfully but NO money has been debited from your account. Your card will only be debited when review the order and release the payment. Your card will ONLY be debited when your order is fulfilled. Thank you for your order. Your card was authenticated successfully but The transaction referenced below has been ABORTED by the Sage Pay payment systems. YOU WILL NOT BE CHARGED FOR THIS TRANSACTION. The Online Merchant has been informed and will NOT send you any goods. Please return to their site and retry your purchase, or contact them directly. We apologise for any inconvenience caused by the cancellation. Please quote your order number in all correspondence with either or Sage Pay. If you have any questions regarding the online card payment system, contact Sage Pay at: Please be aware that Sage Pay has no involvement with the fulfilment of orders placed through this web site.
